overview: Angus Shee, the Chief Technology Officer at [Tagwhat] (/company/tagwhat), is a mechanical engineer with extensive knowledge in cutting-edge electronics design and manufacturing. As a fellow engineer, he has addressed technical audiences at multiple international manufacturing conferences and has developed and led instructional courses on design and producibility for multi-disciplined engineering teams. He feels strongly that augmented reality, powered by today’s continually-evolving consumer electronics, will completely revolutionize the way people interact with their surroundings and with one another. Angus received his B.S. in mechanical engineering from the Johns Hopkins University and is currently based in Boulder, Colorado.
